verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Unto thee, O Jehova<WH3068>, do I lift up<WH5375> my soul<WH5315>.
O my God<WH430>, in thee have I trusted<WH982>, Let me not be put to shame<WH954>; Let not mine enemies<WH341> triumph over me<WH5970>.
Yea <WH6960>, none that wait for thee shall be put to shame<WH954>: They shall be put to shame<WH954> that deal treacherously<WH898> without cause<WH7387>.
Show <WH3045> me thy ways<WH1870>, O Jehovah<WH3068>; Teach<WH3925> me thy paths<WH734>.
Guide <WH1869> me in thy truth<WH571>, and teach<WH3925> me<WH430>; For thou art the God of my salvation<WH3468>; For thee do I wait<WH6960> all the day<WH3117>.
Remember <WH2142>, O Jehovah<WH3068>, thy tender mercies<WH7356> and thy lovingkindness<WH2617>; For they have been ever of old<WH5769>.

Remember <WH2142> not the sins<WH2403> of my youth<WH5271>, nor my transgressions<WH6588>: According to thy lovingkindness<WH2617> remember<WH2142> thou me<WH2898>, For thy goodness' sake<WH3068>, O Jehovah.
Good <WH2896> and upright<WH3477> is Jehovah<WH3068>: Therefore will he instruct<WH3384> sinners<WH2400> in the way<WH1870>.
The meek<WH6035> will he guide<WH1869> in justice<WH4941>; And the meek<WH6035> will he teach<WH3925> his way<WH1870>.
All the paths<WH734> of Jehovah<WH3068> are lovingkindness<WH2617> and truth<WH571> Unto such as keep<WH5341> his covenant<WH1285> and his testimonies<WH5713>.
For thy name<WH8034>'s sake<WH3068>, O Jehovah, Pardon<WH5545> mine iniquity<WH5771>, for it is great<WH7227>.
What man<WH376> is he that feareth<WH3373> Jehovah<WH3068>? Him shall he instruct<WH3384> in the way<WH1870> that he shall choose<WH977>.
His soul<WH5315> shall dwell<WH3885> at ease<WH2896>; And his seed<WH2233> shall inherit<WH3423> the land<WH776>.
The friendship<WH5475> of Jehovah<WH3068> is with them that fear<WH3373> him<WH3045>; And he will show them his covenant<WH1285>.
Mine eyes<WH5869> are ever<WH8548> toward Jehovah<WH3068>; For he will pluck<WH3318> my feet<WH7272> out of the net<WH7568>.
Turn <WH6437> thee unto me<WH2603>, and have mercy upon me<WH3173>; For I am desolate and afflicted<WH6041>.
The troubles<WH6869> of my heart<WH3824> are enlarged<WH7337>: Oh bring thou me out<WH3318> of my distresses<WH4691>.
Consider <WH7200> mine affliction<WH6040> and my travail<WH5999>; And forgive<WH5375> all my sins<WH2403>.
Consider <WH7200> mine enemies<WH341>, for they are many<WH7231>; And they hate<WH8130> me with cruel<WH2555> hatred<WH8135>.
Oh keep<WH8104> my soul<WH5315>, and deliver<WH5337> me<WH954>: Let me not be put to shame, for I take refuge in thee<WH2620>.
Let integrity<WH8537> and uprightness<WH3476> preserve<WH5341> me<WH6960>, For I wait for thee.
Redeem <WH6299> Israel<WH3478>, O God<WH430>, Out all of his troubles<WH6869>.
